2. Strictly no refunds and cancellations.

3. Delivery address must be in Metro Manila. For delivery addresses outside Metro Manila, customer shall opt for pick up on checkout to proceed with their order.

entry.title: Gyudon with Crunchy Spinach Chips
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eat'sLifeManila
Type:
Price: 1750.00 - 2200.00 (2 variants)

One of our favorite comfort food, introducing our Gyudon with Crunchy Spinach Chips! Sweet and savory thinly sliced beef, gently poached eggs, then topped with fresh scallions, sesame seeds, and tōgarashi spice. All served on a bed of fluffy umami rice.

entry.title: Spicy Korean Salad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eat'sLifeManila
Type:
Price: 1500.00 - 2300.00 (2 variants)

A hearty high protein meat salad for those days you want a more substantial salad. It's refreshing light, perfectly sweet & spicy, tangy, and outrageously flavorful.

Enjoy this salad on its own or as a meal compliment to almost any dish but we recommend you try it with Korean Hungover Soup. This refreshing salad is made of tender roasted beef, fresh lettuce, carrots, cucumber, french beans, honey, and gochujang for the perfect blend of sweet, spicy, and tangy.

Party trays to choose from: 

Good for 6-8 pax or 10-12 pax

A bowl of warmth that drives away your chills. Roasted for warmth Farm-fresh Shiitake and Button mushrooms are delicately roasted to bring out their full flavor, then simmered for hours in real cream, butter, chicken stock and our chef’s blend of herbs & spices until it’s thick and savory. includes one oven-fresh baguettini.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered.


TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. Full payment must be made at least 24 hours before the delivery schedule. You may settle your payment via BPI/BDO Bank Transfer, GCash, or PayPal. For bank transfers, please send us a copy of your proof of payment to thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com

2. Strictly no refunds and cancellations.

3. Delivery address must be in Metro Manila. For delivery addresses outside Metro Manila, customer shall opt for pick up on checkout to proceed with their order.

Big Tray (10-12 pax)
